original: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti tiṇṇaṁ sucaritānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, citte rakkhite taṁ rakkhitaṁ bhavati kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ manokammaṁ.
analyzed: tasmā rakkhita cittassa ati tiṇṇam su caritānam padaṭṭhāna citte rakkhite tam rakkhitam bhavati kāya kammam vacī kammam manaḥ kamma

original: Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāroti sammādiṭṭhiyā bhāvitāya bhāvito bhavati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi purekkhāro ti sammādiṭṭhiyā bhāvitāya bhāvitaḥ bhavati ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: Sammādiṭṭhito hi sammāsaṅkappo pabhavati, sammāsaṅkappato sammāvācā pabhavati, sammāvācāto
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhitaḥ hi sammā saṅkappaḥ pabhavati sammā saṅkappataḥ sammā vācā pabhavati sammā vācātaḥ

original: sammākammanto pabhavati, sammākammantato sammāājīvo pabhavati, sammāājīvato sammāvāyāmo
analyzed: sammā kammantaḥ pabhavati sammā kammantataḥ sammā ājīvaḥ pabhavati sammā ājīvataḥ sammā vāyāmaḥ

original: pabhavati, sammāvāyāmato sammāsati pabhavati, sammāsatito sammāsamādhi pabhavati,
analyzed: pabhavati sammā vāyāmataḥ sammā sati pabhavati sammā satitaḥ sammā samādhi pabhavati

original: sammāsamādhito sammāvimutti pabhavati, sammāvimuttito sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ pabhavati.
analyzed: sammā samādhitaḥ sammā vimutti pabhavati sammā vimuttitaḥ sammā vimutti ñāṇa dassanam pabhavati

original: Ayaṁ anupādiseso puggalo anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu.
analyzed: ayam anupādisesaḥ puggalaḥ anupādisesā ca nibbāna dhātu
